p.s: The speech Boris Johnson delivered during the COP26 World Leaders Summit Opening Ceremony serves as an introduction to the subject of this Summitsummit which is climate change and emphasis on the importance of it.
The britishBritish Primeministerprime minister presents his idea of the climate crisis and his view of the role of COP26.
He starts off by instantly presenting a compasioncomparison to climate change that represents his idea.
The climate crisis in his eyes is a doomsday device steadily coming closer to its detonation and as auch the end of human life as we know it.
This idea of the climate crisis is further expanded whithwith the role of COP26 in this case James Bond, the one to stop it before the time ticks down completely.
But COP26 is not the entirety of James Bond.
It is just the beginning of the fight and the catalyst for other possibilities.
But its importance is still huge.
In Boris Johnson's view COP26 is the one possibility to start and because of it immeasurably important.
